Package de.weltraumschaf.dht.cmd

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    Interface for shell commands.
    Describable
    Implementations can describe them self for giving the user some help.
    Descriptor
    Describes a command.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseCommand
    Base implementation for commands.
    BaseDescriptor
    Base functionality for a command descriptor.
    CommandFactory
    Factory to create command objects depending on the parsed ShellCommand.
    Exit
    Executes `exit` command.
    Help
    Executes `help` command.
    Send
    Executes `send` command.
    Send.Arguments
    Container for the command arguments.
    Start
    Executes `start` command.
    Status
    Executes `status` command.
    Stop
    Executes `stop` command.
